Title: 39632 - # Ways Cloud Accounting is Changing How Businesses Manage Finances
Direction: 675 words. Give 4-8 examples of how cloud accounting is changing the way that businesses are managing their finances. Talk about the ease, convenience, and ability to manage money anytime and anywhere. Discuss these benefits and why so many businesses have made the transition to cloud accounting. Your target audience is tech-minded, so write with this in mind. You can link to the target URL in any section by mentioning Sage One’s cloud accounting software and how easy it is to use.
Anchor Text: cloud accounting software branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: Sage One's cloud accounting software
